compatibility.notes: The GPL-3.0-with-GCC-exception allows for linking with proprietary software under certain conditions, but care must be taken to comply with the terms of the GPL for any derivative works.

key_requirements: Ensure that any combined work that includes the Runtime Library and Independent Modules complies with the GPLv3 terms.
Maintain the integrity of the GPLv3 license and the GCC Runtime Library Exception in distributed works.
license.name: GPL-3.0-with-GCC-exception
obligations: Must include a copy of the GPLv3 license when distributing the software.
Must include the GCC Runtime Library Exception notice when distributing the software.
Must disclose source code when distributing modified versions of the software.
